reviewText: This was a gift for my wife who loves Helen's methodology and uses it in her oil painting.  Unfortunately they have not been released for a reasonable price by PBS or the Van Wyk estate, so we have to content ourselves with used VHS and even they are not always reasonably priced.  My wife loved this!  It arrived on time, intact and as described.
This tape is to short; more information on the use of green and its variations would make it more informative.
